Title: Ilyas Surkov (No. 54)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Brandon Margolis, Brandon Sonnier, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red provides intel on an international terrorist, putting the Task Force on a collision course with another unit from the CIA. Meanwhile, Red and Hawkins lay the groundwork for new business...
